i was too

i am simply not ashamed in thinking today´s music is as good, if not better than the one before, specially because todays tools allow for more experimentation than garage bands and 1 man artists got better chances of recognizion than before

but i will not shove that down everyone´s throat, if you feel 2pac is better than kendrick lamar, good for you.
